    Class PagedFilterBase

    Represents a base class for implementing paged filters.

    Namespace: Innovt.Core.Cqrs.Queries
    Assembly: Innovt.Core.dll
    Syntax
    public class PagedFilterBase : PagedFilterBase<string>, IPagedFilter, IFilter, IValidatableObject
    Remarks

    This class provides a foundation for creating paged filters that can be used to filter and paginate data in a query. Paged filters typically include criteria such as search terms, sorting options, and pagination settings.
